means: 把…排挤掉，取代( supplant的现在分词 )

list.abs: of momentum conservation could supplant Newton ' s third law ., 动量守恒定律可以取代牛顿第三定律.
Tina : what are you saying ? be careful Whinny doesn't supplant you !蒂娜：你说什么呢你？小心以后维尼取代你的位置！
The law of momentum conservation could supplant Newton ' s third law ., 动量守恒定律可以取代牛顿第三定律.
feudal society replaced slavery society , capitalism supplanted feudalism , and , after a , socialism will necessarily supercede capitalism .封建社会代替奴隶社会，资本主义代替封建主义，社会主义经历一个过程发展后必然代替资本主义。

entry.def: If a person or thing is supplanted, another person or thing takes their place.

example.ex: He may be supplanted by a younger man...
example.tran: 他可能会被一个年龄比他小的人取代。

example.ex: By the 1930s the wristwatch had almost completely supplanted the pocket watch.
example.tran: 到了 20 世纪 30 年代，手表几乎完全取代了怀表。

means.word_mean: 1. act of taking the place of another especially using underhanded tactics

auth_sentence.content: She became the virtual head of our family, supplanting my mother.
auth_sentence.res_content: She became the virtual head of our family, supplanting my mother.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She became the virtual head of our family, supplanting my mother.

auth_sentence.content: This could cut the cost of energy-efficiency evaluations by supplanting costly, labor-intensive audits.
auth_sentence.res_content: This could cut the cost of energy-efficiency evaluations by supplanting costly, labor-intensive audits.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This could cut the cost of energy-efficiency evaluations by supplanting costly, labor-intensive audits.

auth_sentence.content: Noma was also the World's Best Restaurant last year, supplanting the four-year reign of Spain's El Bulli.
auth_sentence.res_content: Noma was also the World's Best Restaurant last year, supplanting the four-year reign of Spain's El Bulli.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Noma was also the World's Best Restaurant last year, supplanting the four-year reign of Spain's El Bulli.
